gratitude_entries.entry: Michelle, who listened while I cried about my panic attacks and insisted that I come over to spend the night, even though it was late and she had to work early the next morning
Michelle, for being extremely empathetic, caring, and supportive, and for chatting with me throughout the day while at work
my parents, who were understanding of my breakup and didn't blame me
my mother, who was optimistic in her own way
my parents, for taking care of me
Dan, for expressing concern over my panic attacks and inviting me to stay at their place
Amy Chan, for her Breakup SOS kit
my friends, for listening to my codependency theories because i felt vindicated by it
Lauren, who invited me to dinner on her company's dime upon hearing about the breakup and my arrival to Chicago while she was there for work
Alex, for fixing my git fuck up and saving all my files
my friends, who've kept me afloat during this breakup
my parents, for taking care of me
Maryl, for letting me know to bring warm clothes
Michelle, for always having thoughtful convos with me
Calm, for having targeted meditation packs (especially for forgiveness)
K, who taught me pandas
the comforts of home
my friends, for their support, comfort, and empathy
the 7 min workout, which serves as a simple and effective distraction
Maryl, for letting me borrow her shoes
Michelle, who is always no-nonsense and values honest communication
my parents, for always taking care of me
the Eat Pray Love lady for making an empowering "Master Class" on the Calm app
Casey, for writing me a thoughtful and comforting e-mail
my brain, for being good enough
Dawn, for welcoming my visit despite it being three days earlier than she thought
Michelle, for being straightforward and easy to talk to
Sandy, who agreed to grab my package and watch Crazy Rich Asians with me
Maryl, for welcoming me into her Boulder home
Maryl, for showing me around downtown Boulder
Maryl, for paying for dinner for some reason
Maryl, for commiserating with me about ex's and codependent behavior
Dawn, for binge watching This is Us with me
Dawn, for feeding me
Dawn, for letting me crash on her couch despite being in the middlle of studying for boards
Aurelia, who sent my work to the curators at Mozfest
Maryl, for being honest and empathetic
Maryl, for taking me to Rocky Mountain National Park
Maryl, for being a great host
Maryl, for taking me on hikes every day
Maryl, for talking to me about Al-Anon
Dan, for checking in on me
Isabella, for checking in on me
my friends, for being supportive of me while I die of anxiety over this Mozfest thing
the ability to travel
my friends, for supporting me
having friends to travel to
Sandy, for putting in the effort to be friends
Sandy, for inviting me to things
Lauren, for being really sweet and welcoming
Sandy, for being really good company
having such caring, supportive friends
Maryl, for checking in to see how my flight was
Lauren, for organizing beach days
ITP, for being a really supportive community
Joey, for being great to talk to
Maryl, for encouraging me to do what's best for me
Michelle, for supporting my decision to skip Donut Dash this year
Lauren, for organizing the catskills weekend
Shaon, for calling me
Barak, for being fun to talk to
Nupur, for her nice e-mail
Michelle, for inviting me to boulder with her today
Michelle, for being excited for me and supportive of my work
James, for inviting me to go to ucb
Maryl, for hanging out during her short visit
my brain, for being pretty damn good
Ilana, for making me go to TNO
Terrick, for accompanying me to TNO and giving me an exit strategy
MingWei, for inviting me to the attorney general debate
ITP, for being an easy community to socialize with
West Village on a Sunday night
Jason, for giving me a ticket to Maker Faire
ITP, for being such a supportive community
my friends
being enough
my life
spending the day with Casey at PS1, then getting Mu Ramen and dessert afterward
python, for enabling all my crazy ideas
Bruce Nauman because some of his work at PS1 was inspiring for my thesis
reconnecting with Luigi and having a nice conversation with him as part of the shared gratitude experiment!
Luigi suggesting we hang out soon
